svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/24.7.5 Chrome/126.0.6478.183 Electron/31.3.0 Safari/537.36" version="24.7.5"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="AB0LWQqzWIKsXwhZHqE2"> <mxGraphModel dx="932" dy="974" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="1" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="LAcf64UCNuk_sthzsa9S-1" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rotation=35;fillColor=#CCE5FF;opacity=80;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="25.66" y="275.48" width="860" height="340" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LAcf64UCNuk_sthzsa9S-5" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=5;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="468" y="428" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="600" y="240" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LAcf64UCNuk_sthzsa9S-6" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.67;entryY=0.974;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" target="LAcf64UCNuk_sthzsa9S-1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="468" y="428" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="598" y="428" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LAcf64UCNuk_sthzsa9S-7" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.265;entryY=0.942;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;strokeWidth=3;" edge="1" parent="1" target="LAcf64UCNuk_sthzsa9S-1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="468" y="428" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="491" y="669" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LAcf64UCNuk_sthzsa9S-8" value="" style="curved=1;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.265;exitY=0.941;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;entryX=0.67;entryY=0.971;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;strokeWidth=3;" edge="1" parent="1" source="LAcf64UCNuk_sthzsa9S-1" target="LAcf64UCNuk_sthzsa9S-1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="330" y="570" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="380" y="520" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="330" y="580" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LAcf64UCNuk_sthzsa9S-9" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#000000;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="463" y="422.48" width="10" height="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LAcf64UCNuk_sthzsa9S-11" value="" style="curved=1;endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="440" y="430" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="470" y="455" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="450" y="450" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LAcf64UCNuk_sthzsa9S-12" value="<font style="font-size: 22px;">$$\overrightarrow{r} = (\textcolor{#FF0000}{x}_{r}, \textcolor{#01FF00}{y}_{r},<br>\textcolor{#0000FF}{y}_{r})$$</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="600" y="200" width="170" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LAcf64UCNuk_sthzsa9S-13" value="<font style="font-size: 22px;">$$\theta$$</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="424" y="445" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LAcf64UCNuk_sthzsa9S-14" value="<font style="font-size: 22px;">$$q = cos\ \theta + \overrightarrow{r}\ sin\ \theta $$</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="560" width="240" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
